mapper.sql: uuid, subname, subvalue, subtype, subauth, subhandler, subrecordid, grade, subcreatetime, subedittime, status, subjectadd, articleid, creater
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from subject
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into subject (subname, subvalue, subtype, subauth, subhandler, subrecordid, grade, subcreatetime, subedittime, status, subjectadd, articleid, creater) values (#{subname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subauth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subhandler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subrecordid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subcreatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subedittime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectadd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

subname,
subvalue,

mapper.update:
update subject
subname = #{subname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subvalue = #{subvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subtype = #{subtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subauth = #{subauth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subhandler = #{subhandler,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subrecordid = #{subrecordid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
grade = #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subcreatetime = #{subcreatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subedittime = #{subedittime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subjectadd = #{subjectadd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
articleid = #{articleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update subject set subname = #{subname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subvalue = #{subvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subtype = #{subtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subauth = #{subauth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subhandler = #{subhandler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subrecordid = #{subrecordid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grade = #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subcreatetime = #{subcreatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subedittime = #{subedittime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subjectadd = #{subjectadd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, articleid = #{articleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creater = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into subject (uuid,subname,subauth,subhandler,subrecordid,subcreatetime,status,subjectadd,articleid,creater) select #{subjectid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{subname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{subauth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subauth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{subrecordid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{subcreatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'1',#{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},name from user where uuid = #{createrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(*) from subject where creater = (select name from user where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select * from subject where creater = (select name from user where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) limit #{start,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{limit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from subject where creater = (select name from user where uuid = #{stuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update subject set status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},subhandler = #{subhandler,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where creater = #{creatername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update subject set subhandler = #{subauth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},subcreatetime = #{subcreatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = '1',subjectadd = #{subjectadd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where uuid = #{subid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
